all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And thus, if ye are faithful ye shall be laden with many sheaves, and crowned with honor, and glory, and immortality, and eternal life.
Doctrine and Covenants 75:5
Quote of the Day
"Callings … and other ways we embark in God’s work uniquely prepare us to meet the Savior."
Elder Steven D. Shumway | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
